text: Matthieu Verschuère (born 8 February 1972) is a French former footballer who played as a midfielder. ==References== * * * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Beauvais Category:Association football midfielders Category:French footballers Category:Ligue 1 players Category:AS Beauvais Oise players Category:LB Châteauroux players Category:CS Sedan Ardennes players Category:K.A.A. title: Matthieu Verschuère
